program: Honours in Environmental Economics and Public Policy
notes: Adjustments may be required due to course offerings or granted equivalencies.
Students intending to pursue graduate studies in economics should select MAT1300 or the MAT1320 + MAT1322 sequence.
A strong mathematics background supports success in advanced and graduate-level economics.
Students planning to participate in CO-OP should complete ECO2150 and ECO2151 in second year.
ECO3145, ECO3152, and ECO3153 are strongly recommended for students pursuing a Master's in Economics.
